casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Lenwood Saunders (9564)

O’Connell, Norcott and Heiman, Js.

Argued September 27 decision released October 22, 1991 Beth A. Merkin, assistant public defender, for the appellant (defendant). James M. Ralls, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Michael Dearington, state’s attorney, and Mary Elizabeth Baran, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
